original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du /
translated: until they have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: until they have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment, they will never be separated from the six transcendent perfections.

original: lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / @297a *//
analyzed: lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / @297a *//
translated: In the southern, western, northern, northeastern, southeastern,

original: lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /
analyzed: lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /
translated: southwestern, northwestern, lower and upper directions,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /
translated: they will go to as many world systems as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River,

original: ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la gnas pa de bzhin du /🔽'jig rten gyi khams de dag na /
analyzed: ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la gnas pa de bzhin du / 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na /
translated: and just as I abide in the transcendent perfection of generosity and abide in the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang /
analyzed: sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang /
translated: so too will all those sentient beings who are present in those world systems

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go /
translated: be encouraged and established in the transcendent perfection of generosity and in the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: 'god do // de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang; brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go /
analyzed: 'god do // de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang; brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go /
translated: Similarly, they encourage and establish them in the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'god do // 'di lta ste; pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to //
analyzed: 'god do // 'di lta ste; pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to //
translated: They teach the Dharma of just these six perfections.

original: sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas /
analyzed: sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas /
translated: And those beings, having heard that Dharma,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du /
translated: until they have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro // rab 'byor / 'di lta ste / dper na / sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am /
translated: will never be separated from the six perfections.🔽“Subhūti, it is just as, for example, a magician

original: sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis /
translated: or a magician’s apprentice

original: lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste /
analyzed: lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste /
translated: having sat down at a crossroads

original: skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du /
analyzed: skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du /

original: skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te /

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par @297b bskul zhing bzhag ste /

analyzed: rab 'byor / de la ji snyam du sems /

analyzed: sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am /
translated: Has that magician or

analyzed: sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des /

analyzed: sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par bskul zhing bzhag ste /

analyzed: bkod pa yod dam / gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: de ni ma mchis so //

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti, in the same way,

analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
translated: bodhisattva great beings

original: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /
translated: the intermediate directions, the directions of the nadir and the zenith, as many as there are,

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod kyang /

analyzed: sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa med do //

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor / sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na /

analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par spyod cing /

analyzed: sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed de /

analyzed: bdag @298a *// gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o //

original: 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o //

analyzed: bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o //

original: 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o //

original: 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o //
translated: I will not establish that many.

analyzed: bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o //

original: 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o //
translated: I will not establish that many.

translated: I will establish this many sentient beings in the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, and the state of a worthy one.

original: 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o //
translated: I will not establish that many.

original: bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o //
translated: I will establish this many sentient beings in individual enlightenment.

original: 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o //
translated: I will not establish that many.

original: bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: de 'di snyam du sems te /

analyzed: bdag gis sems can tshad med /

original: grangs med pa /
analyzed: grangs med pa /

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o //

original: bdag gis sems can tshad med /

translated: I will establish immeasurable,

original: grangs med pa /
analyzed: grangs med pa /
translated: incalculable

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o // nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
translated: sentient beings in the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.🔽I will establish them in inner emptiness,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: They should be established in the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o //
translated: the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation, the five clairvoyances, all the meditative stabilizations, and all the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang; mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang; mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o //
translated: They should be established in the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o //

original: rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do //

analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid yid kyis stong ngo //
translated: Likewise, the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind are empty of mind.

original: gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: Form is empty of form.

original: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos chos kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos chos kyis stong ngo //
translated: Sound, smell, taste, touch, and mental objects are empty of mental objects.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: The eye consciousness is empty of eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: The ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind consciousnesses are empty of mind consciousness.

analyzed: mig gis 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo //

translated: Contact at the ear, contact at the nose, contact at the tongue, contact at the body, and contact at the thought-link is empty of contact at the thought-link.

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //

translated: the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom is empty of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: Inner emptiness is empty of inner emptiness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: Up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is empty of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis stong ngo //

original: mngon par mi byed de /
analyzed: mngon par mi byed de /

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa gang po /

analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa gang po /

translated: the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are neither bound nor freed.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: up to the knowledge of all aspects is neither bound nor freed.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ma bcings ma grol ba'o; ;sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ma bcings ma grol ba'o; ;sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //

original: de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Suchness is neither bound nor freed.

original: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //

translated: The unmistaken real nature, the unaltered real nature, the real nature that is the basis of everything, the dharma-constituent, the establishment of dharmas, the certification of dharmas, and the very limit of reality are neither bound nor freed.🔽The unconditioned is neither bound nor freed.

original: de ma bcings ma @307a *//

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'dus ma byas pa la gnas te /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'dus ma byas pa la gnas te /
translated: Abiding in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated,🔽

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de / ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: They abide in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de /
translated: They bring to maturity those sentient beings who are neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //🔽ma bcings ma grol ba de /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do // ma bcings ma grol ba de /

translated: They serve the blessed buddhas, who are neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de /
translated: They listen to the Dharma, which is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral @307b bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽ma bcings ma grol ba de /

translated: They never part from the blessed buddhas, who are neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽ma bcings ma grol ba de /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽ma bcings ma grol ba de /
translated: They never part from the superknowledges, which are neither bound nor liberated.🔽They never part from the dhāraṇīs, which are neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i mig lnga dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽ma bcings ma grol ba de /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i mig lnga dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro // ma bcings ma grol ba de /
translated: They will never be separated from the five eyes that are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzungs rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽ma bcings ma grol ba de /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzungs rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro // ma bcings ma grol ba de /
translated: They will never be separated from the dhāraṇīs that are not bound and not freed.🔽They will never be separated from the liberations that are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽ma bcings ma grol ba de /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro // ma bcings ma grol ba de /
translated: They will never be separated from the concentrations that are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid grol bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽ma bcings ma grol ba de /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid grol bar mi 'gyur ro // ma bcings ma grol ba de /
translated: They will never be separated from the knowledge of the aspects of the path that is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //🔽ma bcings ma grol ba de /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro //

translated: They will never be separated from the knowledge of all aspects that is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de /
translated: They will never be separated from the turning of the wheel of the Dharma that is not bound and not freed.🔽They will never be separated from the knowledge of the destruction of the pollutants that is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god par 'gyur te /
translated: They will establish sentient beings who are neither bound nor liberated in the three vehicles.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa!

analyzed: chos thams cad khong du chud par byed do //

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /

analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o //

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas /
translated: “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings, with the thought that is the union of the knowledge of all aspects,

original: bdag kyang chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med par chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par byed cing /
analyzed: bdag kyang chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med par chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par byed cing /
translated: realize the nature of all phenomena without attachment to any phenomena, by way of the nonapprehension of all phenomena.

original: sems can rnams kyang chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba la /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba la /
translated: and also to encourage, settle, and establish sentient beings in the realization of the nature of all phenomena,

original: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog pa dang / rab tu 'god pa 'di ni /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog pa dang / rab tu 'god pa 'di ni /
translated: without apprehending anything,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: this is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings.

original: de ni / rab 'byor /
analyzed: de ni / rab 'byor /
translated: That,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Subhūti, is the bodhisattva great beings’ Great Vehicle.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings’ Great Vehicle is

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: this:

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid @310a *//
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid @310a *//
translated: inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great immensity, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of beginningless and endless phenomena,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of nonrepudiation, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of nonapprehension, the emptiness of nonexistence,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de /
translated: the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence.

original: de la nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of internal phenomena?”

original: nang gi chos zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nang gi chos zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Internal phenomena” refers to

original: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid de /
analyzed: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid de /
translated: the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind.

original: de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /

original: mig mig gis stong ngo //
analyzed: mig mig gis stong ngo //
translated: The eye is empty of the eye.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is neither permanent nor destroyed,

analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid yid kyis stong ngo //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te; 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do //

original: de la phyi stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la phyi stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of outer phenomena?

original: phyi'i chos zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phyi'i chos zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Outer phenomena are

analyzed: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnams te /

original: de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are neither permanent nor destroyed,

original: gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: forms are empty of forms.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is their nature.

original: de bzhin du mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin du mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Similarly, because they are neither permanent nor destroyed,

analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / @310b chos chos kyis stong ngo //
translated: sounds, smells, tastes, textures, and mental phenomena are empty of mental phenomena.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is their nature.

analyzed: 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o //

analyzed: nang gi skye mched drug dang / phyi'i skye mched drug dang / 'di dag ni phyi nang gi chos zhes bya ste /
translated: The six sense sources of the internal and the six sense sources of the external are called internal and external phenomena.

original: de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are impermanent and do not disintegrate,

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro; ;phyi'i chos rnams nang gi chos rnams kyis stong ngo //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because that is their nature.

original: 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called “internal and external emptiness.”

original: de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of emptiness?

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are impermanent and do not disintegrate,

original: chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid des stong pa nyid stong ngo //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid des stong pa nyid stong ngo //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /

analyzed: 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o; ;de la chen po stong pa nyid gang zhe na /

analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir / shar phyogs shar phyogs kyis stong /
translated: Because it is neither permanent nor destroyed,🔽the east is empty of the east.

original: lho phyogs lho phyogs kyis stong /
analyzed: lho phyogs lho phyogs kyis stong /

analyzed: nub phyogs nub phyogs kyis stong / byang phyogs byang phyogs kyis stong / 'og gi phyogs 'og gi phyogs kyis stong /
translated: The west is empty of the west.🔽The north is empty of the north.🔽The nadir is empty of the nadir.

original: steng gi phyogs steng gi phyogs kyis stong /
analyzed: steng gi phyogs steng gi phyogs kyis stong /

original: phyogs mtshams rnams phyogs mtshams rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: phyogs mtshams rnams phyogs mtshams rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The intermediate directions are empty of the intermediate directions.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is the very nature of the intermediate directions.

original: 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of the great.

original: de la don dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la don dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of the ultimate?”

original: don dam pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /🔽mi rtag @311a *//
analyzed: don dam pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste / mi rtag @311a *//
translated: The ultimate is nirvana.

original: mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is neither permanent nor destroyed,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa de'ang mya ngan las 'das pas stong ngo //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa de'ang mya ngan las 'das pas stong ngo //
translated: That nirvana is empty of nirvana.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na /

original: 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te /
analyzed: 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te /
translated: The conditioned is the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm.

original: de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are neither permanent nor destroyed,

original: 'dod pa'i khams 'dod pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams 'dod pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the desire realm is empty of the desire realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams gzugs kyi khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams gzugs kyi khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The form realm is empty of the form realm.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams gzugs med pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams gzugs med pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The formless realm is empty of the formless realm.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is their nature.

original: 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o //

original: de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na /

original: 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas zhes bya ste /
translated: The unconditioned is said to be that which has no arising, no cessation, and no abiding.

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: It is not impermanent and does not disintegrate.

original: 'dus ma byas de ni 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas de ni 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo //
translated: The unconditioned is empty of the unconditioned.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of beyond extremes?

original: gang la mtha' mi dmigs pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: gang la mtha' mi dmigs pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa ste /
translated: The extreme is not apprehended in the beyond extreme.

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: It is not impermanent and does not disintegrate.

original: mtha' las 'das pa mtha' las 'das pas stong ngo //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa mtha' las 'das pas stong ngo //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //

analyzed: de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /

analyzed: gang la thog ma mi dmigs shing /

original: 'ong ba'ang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: 'ong ba'ang mi dmigs te /

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa thog ma dang tha ma med pas stong ngo //

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /

analyzed: 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //

analyzed: gang la gang yang dor ba med pa ste /

analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /

analyzed: dor ba med pa dor ba med pas stong ngo //

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas /

original: nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: nyid gang zhe na /

original: chos thams cad ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ces bya ba ni /
translated: All phenomena are

original: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang /🔽ro dang / reg dang / chos dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
translated: form,🔽feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness; the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind; forms, sounds, smells, tastes,🔽tactile objects, and mental phenomena; the eye consciousness, ear consciousness, nose consciousness, tongue consciousness, body consciousness, and mind consciousness;

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
translated: eye contact, ear contact, nose contact, tongue contact, body contact, and mind contact; the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact,🔽the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact, and the feeling that arises from the condition of mind contact;

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
translated: the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the ear, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the body, and the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the mind.

original: gzugs yod pa'i chos dang / gzugs med pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos te /
analyzed: gzugs yod pa'i chos dang / gzugs med pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos te /
translated: the phenomena of form, the phenomena of formlessness, the conditioned phenomena, and the unconditioned phenomena.

original: 'di dag ni chos thams cad ces bya'o //🔽de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di dag ni chos thams cad ces bya'o // de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: These are called all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo //
translated: “All phenomena are empty of all phenomena because they are impermanent and do not perish.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is their nature.

original: 'di @312b ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di @312b ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of defining characteristics?

original: gzugs ni 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: gzugs ni 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Form has the defining characteristic of disintegration.

original: tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Feeling has the characteristic of experience.

original: 'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: 'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Perception has the characteristic of apprehending.

original: 'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: 'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Disposition has the characteristic of disposition.

original: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: Consciousness has the characteristic of cognition.

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /🔽'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i rang rang gi mtshan nyid de dag gis /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir / 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i rang rang gi mtshan nyid de dag gis /
translated: Because they are neither permanent nor annihilated,

original: chos de dag thams cad stong ngo //
analyzed: chos de dag thams cad stong ngo //
translated: all those phenomena, whether conditioned or unconditioned, are empty of their own characteristics.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: de dag gi rang bzhin ni de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de dag gi rang bzhin ni de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is their nature.

original: 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the emptiness of non-apprehension?

original: gang la 'das pa mi dmigs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa mi dmigs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gnas mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: gang la 'das pa mi dmigs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa mi dmigs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gnas mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: That which is not apprehended in the past, is not apprehended in the future, and does not abide in the present,

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: because they are neither permanent nor annihilated.

original: mi dmigs pa mi dmigs pas stong ngo //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa mi dmigs pas stong ngo //
translated: The non-apprehension of non-apprehension is empty of the non-apprehension of non-apprehension.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities?”

original: chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir /
translated: Because all phenomena arise in dependence,

original: 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: they do not have an essential nature that is a composite.

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are neither permanent nor annihilated,

original: 'dus pa 'dus pas stong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus pa 'dus pas stong ngo //
translated: a composite is empty of a composite.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /🔽'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa @313a *//
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te / 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa @313a *//
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: nyid ces bya'o ////
analyzed: nyid ces bya'o ////
translated: This is called the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in Twenty-Five Thousand Lines

original: bam po bcu drug pa /🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo //
analyzed: bam po bcu drug pa / rab 'byor / gzhan yang dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo //
translated: fascicle sixteen🔽“Furthermore, Subhūti, entities are empty of entities,

original: dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo //
translated: and non-entities are empty of non-entities.

original: rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Nature is empty of nature.

original: gzhan gyi dngos po ni gzhan gyi dngos pos stong ngo //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dngos po ni gzhan gyi dngos pos stong ngo //
translated: Other-nature is empty of other-nature.

original: de la dngos po dngos po zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dngos po dngos po zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is a thing?

original: phung po lnga ste /
analyzed: phung po lnga ste /
translated: It is the five aggregates.

original: phung po de dag kyang phung po rnams kyis stong pas /
analyzed: phung po de dag kyang phung po rnams kyis stong pas /
translated: Those aggregates are empty of the aggregates.

original: de ltar na dngos po dngos pos stong ngo //
analyzed: de ltar na dngos po dngos pos stong ngo //
translated: Thus, a thing is empty of a thing.

original: ji ltar na dngos po med pa dngos po med pas stong zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na dngos po med pa dngos po med pas stong zhe na /
translated: How is a non-thing empty of a non-thing?

original: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: A non-thing is

original: 'dus ma byas te /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas te /
translated: unconditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas de'ang 'dus ma byas kyis stong pas /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas de'ang 'dus ma byas kyis stong pas /
translated: That unconditioned is empty of the unconditioned.

original: de ltar na dngos po med pa dngos po med pas stong ngo //
analyzed: de ltar na dngos po med pa dngos po med pas stong ngo //
translated: Thus, a non-thing is empty of a non-thing.

original: ji ltar na rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong zhe na /
translated: How is a nature empty of a nature?

original: rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
translated: A nature is

original: ngo bo nyid ma nor ba ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ma nor ba ste /
translated: unmistaken.

original: de la stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes pas ma byas /
analyzed: de la stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes pas ma byas /
translated: That emptiness is not made by knowing,

original: mthong bas ma byas te /
analyzed: mthong bas ma byas te /
translated: not made by seeing.

original: 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of nature.

original: de la gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of other entities?”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste /
translated: Whether the Tathāgatas arise or not,

original: chos kyi gnas nyid dang; chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i @313b mtha' ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste /
analyzed: chos kyi gnas nyid dang; chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i @313b mtha' ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste /
translated: the reality of phenomena, the intrinsic nature of phenomena, the dharma-constituent, the establishment of phenomena, the establishment of the dharmadhātu, the signless, the wishless, the unconditioned, and the unarisen and unceasing nature of phenomena remain just as they are.

original: de ltar chos de dag gzhan gyis stong pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid ces bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar chos de dag gzhan gyis stong pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid ces bya ste /
translated: The emptiness of those phenomena being empty of other entities is called the emptiness of other entities.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Subhūti, this is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: are as follows:

original: dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the heroic progress meditative stabilization, the jewel seal meditative stabilization, the lion’s play meditative stabilization, the good moon meditative stabilization,

original: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang; chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang; chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the glorious moon banner meditative stabilization, the exalted above all meditative stabilization, the seal of all meditative stabilization, the looking at the crown meditative stabilization,

original: chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi called definite in the realm of phenomena, the samādhi called glorious banner of certainty, the samādhi called vajra, the samādhi called the seal that engages with all phenomena,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang; dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang; dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi called abiding like the king of samādhis, the samādhi called radiating light rays, the samādhi called arrayed army, the samādhi called exalted,

original: nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting @314a *//
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting @314a *//

original: nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dvags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

translated: the samādhi called Entering the Name, the samādhi called Observing the Directions, the samādhi called Holding the Seal, the samādhi called Unfailing,

original: chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang; nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

translated: the samādhi called the Seal of the Ocean of the True Gathering of All Dharmas, the samādhi called Filling the Space, the samādhi called Vajra Maṇḍala, the samādhi called Victory Banner’s Armlet,

original: dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sengge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

translated: It is the samādhi in which one sees that there is nothing that is not included in the sameness of all phenomena.

original: 'di ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called the sameness of all phenomena.

original: de la dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: de la dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad kyi dga' ba spong ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad kyi dga' ba spong ba ste /

original: 'di ni dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: de la chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ni chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to // de la rnam par @322a *//

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

analyzed: chos thams cad rnam par 'thor ba ste /

translated: Standing in this meditative stabilization,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi kun gzhi nye bar mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi kun gzhi nye bar mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: The meditative absorption of the foundation of all meditative absorptions is not observed.

original: 'di ni gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //🔽de la de bzhin nyid la gnas shing /
analyzed: 'di ni gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to // de la de bzhin nyid la gnas shing /
translated: This is the meditative absorption called “effortless observation of the foundation.”

original: sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: “What is the meditative absorption called ‘abiding in suchness’?

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pa ste /🔽'di ni de bzhin nyid la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pa ste / 'di ni de bzhin nyid la gnas shing /
translated: It is the meditative absorption of abiding in the suchness of all meditative absorptions.

original: sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge @327a *//
analyzed: sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge @327a *//
translated: This is the meditative absorption called ‘abiding in suchness.’

original: 'dzin to // de la lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: 'dzin to // de la lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: “What is the meditative absorption called ‘eliminating the faults of the body’?🔽It is the meditative absorption of not observing the body of all meditative absorptions.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi lus mi dmigs pa ste; 'di ni lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi lus mi dmigs pa ste; 'di ni lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the meditative absorption called ‘eliminating the faults of the body.’

original: de la ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called the space-like destruction of the faults of speech?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: Abiding in this samādhi,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ngag gi las mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ngag gi las mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: the activity of speech of all samādhis is non-apprehensible.

original: 'di ni ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called the space-like destruction of the faults of speech.

original: de la yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called the complete elimination of the faults of the mind?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: Abiding in this samādhi,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad yid kyi las mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad yid kyi las mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: the activity of the mind of all samādhis is non-apprehensible.🔽This is the samādhi called the complete elimination of the faults of the mind.

original: 'di ni yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to; ;de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ni yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to; ;de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called the liberation that is unstained like space?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: Abiding in this samādhi,

original: chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas /
analyzed: chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas /
translated: Since all phenomena are like space, without attachment,

original: rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa 'thob pa ste /🔽'di ni nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas /
analyzed: rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa 'thob pa ste / 'di ni nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas /
translated: one attains complete liberation and non-attachment.

original: rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the meditative absorption called “liberation and non-attachment, like space without obstruction.”

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Subhūti, this is the Great Vehicle of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u brgyad pa'o ////
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u brgyad pa'o ////
translated: This was the eighth chapter, “The Great Vehicle,” from the Perfection of Wisdom in Twenty-Five Thousand Lines.

original: @327b rab 'byor /
analyzed: @327b rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po 'di lta ste /
translated: the Great Vehicle of bodhisattva great beings is as follows:

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ste /
translated: the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o //
analyzed: lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o //
translated: and the application of mindfulness to dharmas.

original: de la lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the application of mindfulness to the body?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings, with regard to the internal body, watch the body but do not apprehend anything.

original: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: They are energetic, have introspection, and are mindful.

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
translated: They eliminate worldly desire and unhappiness and practice.

original: lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They do not conceptualize the concepts associated with the body.

original: phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
translated: With regard to the external body, they watch the body but do not apprehend anything.

original: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
translated: They are energetic, have introspection,

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: and are mindful.

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
translated: They may engage in conduct to clear away worldly attachment and unhappiness,

original: lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: but they are not conceptualizing about the thoughts associated with the body.

original: phyi nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: phyi nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
translated: They observe the body in the body, but they do so without apprehending anything.

original: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
translated: They are diligent, aware,

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: and mindful.

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
translated: They may engage in conduct to clear away worldly attachment and unhappiness,

original: lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: but they are not conceptualizing about the thoughts associated with the body.

original: nang gi tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: nang gi tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /
translated: They observe phenomena in inner feelings, mind, and phenomena, but they do so without apprehending anything.

original: @328a *// brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pas /
analyzed: @328a *// brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pas /
translated: They are diligent, aware,

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: and mindful.

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
translated: They may engage in conduct that dispels worldly attachment and mental dissatisfaction,

original: chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: but they do not engage in conceptual thoughts that are in accord with the Dharma.

original: phyi'i tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: phyi'i tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /
translated: “They may observe outer feelings, mind, and phenomena while not apprehending anything,

original: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
translated: and they may be diligent, vigilant,

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: and mindful.

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
translated: They may engage in conduct that dispels worldly attachment and mental dissatisfaction,

original: chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go; phyi nang gi tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go; phyi nang gi tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /
translated: but they do not engage in conceptual thoughts that are in accord with the Dharma. They may observe outer and inner feelings, mind, and phenomena while not apprehending anything,

original: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
translated: and they may be diligent, vigilant,

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: and mindful.

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
translated: and although they are active in the world,

original: chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: they are not active in regard to the conceptual thoughts that are in conformity with the Dharma.

original: rab 'byor / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
translated: “Subhūti, how are bodhisattva great beings who are attentive to the body in the body

original: rnam par spyod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par spyod pa yin zhe na /
translated: active?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gro na 'gro'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //🔽'greng na 'greng ngo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //🔽'dug na 'dug go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gro na 'gro'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so // 'greng na 'greng ngo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so // 'dug na 'dug go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings, when they are walking, know ‘I am walking.’🔽When they are standing, they know ‘I am standing.’🔽When they are sitting, they know ‘I am sitting.’

original: nyal na nyal lo zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
analyzed: nyal na nyal lo zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
translated: When they are lying down, they know ‘I am lying down.’

original: de'i lus nyams bde ba'am /
analyzed: de'i lus nyams bde ba'am /
translated: Whether their body is at ease

original: @328b mi bde yang rung /
analyzed: @328b mi bde yang rung /
translated: or not at ease,

original: lus ji lta ji ltar gnas pa /
analyzed: lus ji lta ji ltar gnas pa /
translated: whatever the body is doing,

original: de lta de ltar des rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de lta de ltar des rab tu shes so //
translated: they know it just as it is.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /🔽brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
translated: In this way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva mahāsattva, with regard to the internal body, observes the body, but does not observe anything.

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: He is diligent, mindful, and endowed with alertness.

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do //
translated: He is free from the mental afflictions of worldly attachment and aversion.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the bodhisattva mahāsattva, with regard to the internal body, observes the body, but does not observe anything.

original: de 'gro'am 'ong yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /🔽lta'am / rnam par lta'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /🔽bskum mam / brkyang yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
analyzed: de 'gro'am 'ong yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin / lta'am / rnam par lta'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin / bskum mam / brkyang yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
translated: Whether going or coming, he is aware of what he is doing.🔽Whether looking straight ahead or looking to the side, he is aware of what he is doing.🔽Whether bending or extending his limbs, he is aware of what he is doing.

original: sbyar ma dang / lhung bzed 'chang zhing spyod kyang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sbyar ma dang / lhung bzed 'chang zhing spyod kyang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
translated: Whether carrying his robes and alms bowl, or looking at his body, he is aware of what he is doing.

original: zos pa dang / 'chos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / myangs pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
analyzed: zos pa dang / 'chos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / myangs pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
translated: They are also mindful when eating, chewing, drinking, and tasting.

original: nyal ba dang / gnyid kyi mya myo bsal ba'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
analyzed: nyal ba dang / gnyid kyi mya myo bsal ba'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
translated: They are also mindful when lying down and when removing sleepiness and fatigue.

original: 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / gnyid kyis log pa dang / ma log pa dang / smra ba dang / mi smra ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / gnyid kyis log pa dang / ma log pa dang / smra ba dang / mi smra ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin te /
translated: They are also mindful when going, coming, standing, sitting, sleeping, not sleeping, speaking, not speaking, and when in meditative equipoise.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, in that way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
translated: they watch over their body internally, without objectifying it.

original: brtson 'grus @329a *//
analyzed: brtson 'grus @329a *//
translated: They are diligent,

original: can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
translated: alert,

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: and mindful.

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do //
translated: They practice while dispelling worldly attachment and unhappiness.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu na'ang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu na'ang /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,🔽when they breathe in, they are mindful.

original: dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: When they breathe in, they know, “I am breathing in.”

original: dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu na'ang /
analyzed: dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu na'ang /
translated: When they breathe out, they are mindful.

original: dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: When they breathe out, they know, “I am breathing out.”

original: dbugs nang du ring du rgyu na'ang /
analyzed: dbugs nang du ring du rgyu na'ang /
translated: When they breathe in long,

original: dbugs nang du ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dbugs nang du ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: they know, “I am breathing in long.”

original: dbugs phyir ring du rgyu na'ang dbugs phyir ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dbugs phyir ring du rgyu na'ang dbugs phyir ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: When they breathe out long, they know, “I am breathing out long.”

original: dbugs nang du thung du rgyu na'ang /
analyzed: dbugs nang du thung du rgyu na'ang /
translated: When they breathe in short,

original: dbugs nang du thung du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dbugs nang du thung du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: they know, “I am breathing in short.”

original: dbugs phyir thung du rgyu na'ang /
analyzed: dbugs phyir thung du rgyu na'ang /
translated: When they breathe out short,

original: dbugs phyir thung du rgyu 'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
analyzed: dbugs phyir thung du rgyu 'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
translated: they know, “I am breathing out short.”

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / rdza mkhan 'khor lo bskor ba'am /🔽rdza mkhan 'khor lo bskor ba'i mchan bu mkhas pa ni ring du bskor na ring du bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dper na / rdza mkhan 'khor lo bskor ba'am / rdza mkhan 'khor lo bskor ba'i mchan bu mkhas pa ni ring du bskor na ring du bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: for example, a potter or a potter’s skilled apprentice, when turning a wheel,🔽if they turn it for a long time, they know it is being turned for a long time.

original: thung du bskor na thung du bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: thung du bskor na thung du bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: If they turn it for a short time, they know it is being turned for a short time.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: dran par dbugs nang du rgyus na'ang /
analyzed: dran par dbugs nang du rgyus na'ang /
translated: when they breathe in with mindfulness,

original: dran par dbugs nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu @329b shes so //
analyzed: dran par dbugs nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu @329b shes so //
translated: they know, ‘I am breathing in with mindfulness.’

original: dran par dbugs phyir rgyus na'ang /
analyzed: dran par dbugs phyir rgyus na'ang /

original: dran par dbugs phyir rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dran par dbugs phyir rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: they know, ‘I am breathing out with mindfulness.’

original: dbugs ring du nang du rgyus na'ang /
analyzed: dbugs ring du nang du rgyus na'ang /
translated: When they breathe in long,

original: dbugs ring du nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dbugs ring du nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: they know, ‘I am breathing in long.’

original: dbugs ring du phyir rgyus na'ang /
analyzed: dbugs ring du phyir rgyus na'ang /
