original: dbugs ring du phyir rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dbugs ring du phyir rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: when exhaling a long breath, he knows “I am exhaling a long breath”;

original: dbugs thung du nang du rgyus na'ang /
analyzed: dbugs thung du nang du rgyus na'ang /
translated: when inhaling a short breath,

original: dbugs thung du nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dbugs thung du nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //

original: dbugs thung du phyir rgyus na'ang /
analyzed: dbugs thung du phyir rgyus na'ang /

original: dbugs thung du phyir rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
analyzed: dbugs thung du phyir rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
translated: he knows “I am exhaling a short breath.”

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

analyzed: nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /

analyzed: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa / dran pa dang ldan pas /

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal zhing rnam par spyod do //

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

analyzed: lus 'di la sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam pa yang dag pa ji ltar ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste /

analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

analyzed: dper na / ba lang gi bshan pa'am /

analyzed: ba lang gi bshan pa'i mchan bu mkhas pas mtshon rnon po thogs te / ba lang bsad cing bag bzhir gshegs te /

analyzed: so sor phye nas 'greng nga ma 'dug ste /

analyzed: de la rab tu @330a *//

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang /

analyzed: lus 'di la sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste /
translated: “In this body there is the earth element, the water element, the fire element, and the wind element.”

analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /

analyzed: 'greng ngam 'dug ste /

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: and aware,

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde pa rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do //
translated: and they practice with the world’s attachment and unhappiness cleared away.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad /
analyzed: lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad /
translated: in this very body, from the soles of the feet upward,

analyzed: klad pa dang / skra man chad /

analyzed: sen mo dang / spu dang / pags pa yan chad mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste /

translated: lungs, spleen, stomach, intestines, mesentery, feces, urine, tears, sweat, grease, mucus, and phlegm.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /

analyzed: 'di ni 'bras so //

analyzed: 'di dag ni de ma yin pa'i 'bru gzhan no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //

analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad / sgra dang / spyi bo man chad /

original: sen mo dang / spu dang / pags pa yan chad /
analyzed: sen mo dang / spu dang / pags pa yan chad /

analyzed: mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste /

original: lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen me dang / pags pa dang / glog pa dang / sha dang / chu ba dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / snying dang / mkhal ma dang / mchin pa dang /
analyzed: lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen me dang / pags pa dang / glog pa dang / sha dang / chu ba dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / snying dang / mkhal ma dang / mchin pa dang /
translated: In this body there are head-hairs, body-hairs, nails, teeth, skin, flesh, sinews, bones, marrow, kidney, heart, liver,

analyzed: glo ba dang / mtsher pa dang / long ga dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / nang grol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / rngul dang / tshil dang / snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang /🔽mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu ser @331a *//
translated: lungs, spleen, intestines, mesentery, stomach, excrement, tears, grease, spit, mucus, synovial fluid, urine, and blood.

original: dang; kha chu dang / dri ma dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / rngu ma dang / rna spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog go /
analyzed: dang; kha chu dang / dri ma dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / rngu ma dang / rna spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog go /
translated: and there is also pus, blood, rheum, spittle, snot, oil-of-the-joints, urine, and brain and bone marrow.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

analyzed: nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /

original: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas /

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do //

translated: They are free from worldly desire and depression, and they practice.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

analyzed: nam dur khrod na yod pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dur khrod du bor ba /

analyzed: rnam par gzhigs pa'am / rnam par zos pa'am /

analyzed: rnam par 'thor ba mthong na / de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te / lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can /

analyzed: 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te; chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar sbyor ro //

analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod @331b pa'i tshe /

analyzed: phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

analyzed: nam dur khrod du por ba'i ro shi nas zhag drug lon pa'am /

analyzed: lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can /

original: 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te /

analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: In this way, Subhūti, do bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /🔽brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas /

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do //

analyzed: 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi ste /

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: rab @334b 'byor /
analyzed: rab @334b 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,🔽here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom🔽generate the will, strive,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

original: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir /🔽de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo //
analyzed: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo //
translated: and make the right aspiration so that nonvirtuous dharmas that have not yet arisen will not arise.

original: brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
translated: They generate the will, strive,

original: sems kyi mthu bskyed do //🔽yang dag par smon lam 'debs so //
analyzed: sems kyi mthu bskyed do // yang dag par smon lam 'debs so //
translated: exert the power of the mind,

original: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir /
translated: and make the right aspiration so that nonvirtuous dharmas that have arisen will be eliminated.🔽They generate the will, strive,

original: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo //
analyzed: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo //
translated: exert the power of the mind,🔽and make the right aspiration so that virtuous dharmas that have not yet arisen will arise.

original: brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
translated: They generate the will, strive,

original: sems kyi mthu bskyed do //
analyzed: sems kyi mthu bskyed do //
translated: exert the power of the mind,🔽and make the right aspiration so that virtuous dharmas that have arisen will remain, will not disappear, will be applied,

original: yang dag par smon lam 'debs so //
analyzed: yang dag par smon lam 'debs so //
translated: will be expanded, will be cultivated, and will be perfected.

original: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir; de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo //🔽brtson 'grus rtsom mo //🔽sems kyi mthu bskyed do //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir; de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo // brtson 'grus rtsom mo // sems kyi mthu bskyed do //
translated: “In order to generate wholesome states that have not yet arisen, they generate enthusiasm and strive, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive with vigor, without apprehending anything.

original: yang dag par smon lam 'debs so //
analyzed: yang dag par smon lam 'debs so //
translated: They generate enthusiasm and strive, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive with vigor in order to maintain wholesome states that have arisen,🔽to increase wholesome states that have arisen,🔽to generate wholesome states that have not yet arisen,

original: dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / phyir zhing bsgom pa dang / nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / phyir zhing bsgom pa dang / nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: and to bring to completion wholesome states that have arisen.

original: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo //🔽brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
analyzed: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo // brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
translated: “In order to generate wholesome states that have not yet arisen, they generate enthusiasm and strive, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive with vigor, without apprehending anything.

original: sems kyi mthu bskyed do //
analyzed: sems kyi mthu bskyed do //
translated: They generate enthusiasm and strive, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive with vigor in order to maintain wholesome states that have arisen,🔽to increase wholesome states that have arisen,

original: yang dag par smon lam 'debs te /
analyzed: yang dag par smon lam 'debs te /
translated: and to bring to completion wholesome states that have arisen.

original: rab 'byor / 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: “Subhūti, this too is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings

original: 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste /
translated: is the four bases of miraculous power.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab @335a *//🔽kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab @335a *// kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa /
analyzed: mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa /
translated: meditate on the basis of supernormal knowledge that is the foot of miraculous power endowed with concentration due to aspiration, the formative force of renunciation, based on isolation,

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
translated: based on nonattraction,

original: 'gog pa la gnas pa /
analyzed: 'gog pa la gnas pa /
translated: based on cessation,

original: rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom mo //
analyzed: rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom mo //
translated: and perfected by renunciation.

original: brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa /
translated: They meditate on the basis of supernormal knowledge that is the foot of miraculous power endowed with concentration due to perseverance, the formative force of renunciation, based on isolation,

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
translated: based on nonattraction,

original: 'gog pa la gnas pa /
analyzed: 'gog pa la gnas pa /
translated: based on cessation,

original: rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom mo //
analyzed: rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom mo //
translated: and perfected by renunciation.

original: sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa 'a rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa /
analyzed: sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa 'a rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa /
translated: They meditate on the basis of supernormal knowledge that is the foot of miraculous power endowed with concentration due to mind, the formative force of renunciation, based on isolation,🔽based on nonattraction,

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
translated: based on cessation,🔽and perfected by renunciation.

original: 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom mo //
analyzed: 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom mo //
translated: He cultivates the perfection of meditation that is based on the foundation of mindfulness, that is based on the foundation of the right efforts, that is based on the foundation of the supernatural powers, that is based on the foundation of the faculties, that is based on the foundation of the powers, and that is based on the foundation of the branches of enlightenment.

original: dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa /🔽'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
analyzed: dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa / 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
translated: He cultivates the perfection of meditation that is based on the foundation of the right and that is based on the foundation of the branches of the path.

original: 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom ste /🔽rab 'byor / 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom ste / rab 'byor / 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o // rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: He cultivates the perfection of meditation that is based on the foundation of the mindfulness that is based on inner experience, that is based on the foundation of the mindfulness that is based on outer experience, and that is based on the foundation of the mindfulness that is based on both inner and outer experience.

original: 'di ltar dbang po lnga ste /🔽lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar dbang po lnga ste / lnga gang zhe na /
translated: He cultivates the perfection of meditation that is based on the foundation of the mindfulness that is based on phenomena, that is based on the foundation of the right efforts, that is based on the foundation of the supernatural powers, that is based on the foundation of the faculties, that is based on the foundation of the powers, and that is based on the foundation of the branches of enlightenment.🔽He cultivates the perfection of meditation that is based on the foundation of the mindfulness that is based on phenomena, that is based on the foundation of the right efforts, that is based on the foundation of the supernatural powers, that is based on the foundation of the faculties, that is based on the foundation of the powers, and that is based on the foundation of the branches of enlightenment.🔽He cultivates the perfection of meditation that is based on the foundation of the mindfulness that is based on phenomena, that is based on the foundation of the right efforts, that is based on the foundation of the supernatural powers, that is based on the foundation of the faculties, that is based on the foundation of the powers, and that is based on the foundation of the branches of enlightenment.

original: dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste /
analyzed: dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste /
translated: He cultivates the perfection of meditation that is based on the foundation of the mindfulness that is based on phenomena, that is based on the foundation of the right efforts, that is based on the foundation of the supernatural powers, that is based on the foundation of the faculties, that is based on the foundation of the powers, and that is based on the foundation of the branches of enlightenment.🔽He cultivates the perfection of meditation that is based on the foundation of the mindfulness that is based on phenomena, that is based on the foundation of the right efforts, that is based on

original: rab 'byor / @335b 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis /
analyzed: rab 'byor / @335b 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis /
translated: Subhuti, this too is the bodhisattva great beings’ skill in means, in that they do not apprehend anything.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Subhūti, this too is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings, in that it does not settle down on anything.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is as follows:

original: 'di ltar stobs lnga ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar stobs lnga ste /
translated: it is the five strengths.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs te /
analyzed: dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs te /
translated: They are the strength of faith, the strength of perseverance, the strength of mindfulness, the strength of concentration, and the strength of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Subhūti, this too is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings, in that it does not settle down on anything.🔽“Furthermore, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is as follows:

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te /
translated: it is the seven parts of awakening.

original: bdun gang zhe na /
analyzed: bdun gang zhe na /
translated: What are the seven?

original: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa /
analyzed: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa /
translated: They are the part of awakening of mindfulness, which is based on isolation, based on dispassion, and based on cessation, and which is conducive to letting go;

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /🔽'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa / 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas /
translated: They abide in freedom from attachment.🔽They abide in cessation, through complete elimination.

original: yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo //
analyzed: yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo //
translated: “He cultivates the limb of enlightenment of investigation of phenomena,🔽the limb of enlightenment of energy,🔽the limb of enlightenment of joy,

original: chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
analyzed: chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
translated: the limb of enlightenment of agility,🔽the limb of enlightenment of concentration,

original: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa /
translated: and the limb of enlightenment of equanimity, based on isolation,

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
translated: based on nonattraction,

original: 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas /🔽yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul @336a *//
analyzed: 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas / yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul @336a *//
translated: based on cessation, and matured by relinquishment.🔽“He cultivates the limb of enlightenment of equanimity, based on isolation,🔽based on nonattraction,

original: gyis bsgom ste /
analyzed: gyis bsgom ste /
translated: based on cessation, and matured by relinquishment.

original: rab 'byor / 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: “Subhūti, this too is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings

original: 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste /
translated: is the eightfold path of the noble ones.

original: de'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de'ang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba dben pa la gnas pa /🔽'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba dben pa la gnas pa / 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
translated: Right view, which is based on solitude,🔽based on dispassion,

original: 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas /
analyzed: 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas /
translated: based on cessation, and which is let go of through relinquishment,

original: yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo //
analyzed: yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo //
translated: is cultivated without apprehending anything.

original: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dben pa la gnas pa /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dben pa la gnas pa /
translated: Right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right concentration, which are based on solitude,

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
translated: based on dispassion,

original: 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas /
analyzed: 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas /
translated: based on cessation, and which are let go of through relinquishment,

original: yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom ste /
analyzed: yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom ste /
translated: are cultivated without apprehending anything.

original: rab 'byor / 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: This, Subhūti, is also the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva mahāsattva.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva mahāsattva is as follows:

original: ting nge 'dzin gsum ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gsum ste /
translated: There are three meditative stabilizations.

original: gsum gang zhe na /
analyzed: gsum gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three?

original: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: They are the meditative stabilization of emptiness, the meditative stabilization of signlessness, and the meditative stabilization of aspirationlessness.

original: de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the meditative stabilization of emptiness?

original: chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid @336b du rtog pa'i tshe /
analyzed: chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid @336b du rtog pa'i tshe /
translated: When all phenomena are contemplated as empty of their own marks,

original: sems gnas pa stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste /
analyzed: sems gnas pa stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste /
translated: the mind is still, the gateway to liberation of emptiness.

original: 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the meditative stabilization of emptiness.

original: de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the meditative stabilization of signlessness?

original: chos thams cad mtshan ma med par rtog pa'i tshe /
analyzed: chos thams cad mtshan ma med par rtog pa'i tshe /
translated: When all phenomena are contemplated as signless,

original: sems gnas pa mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste /
analyzed: sems gnas pa mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste /
translated: The gateway to liberation that is signlessness is the abiding of the mind.

original: 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the meditative absorption of signlessness.

original: de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, is the meditative absorption of aspirationlessness?

original: chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med do zhes mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i tshe /
analyzed: chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med do zhes mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i tshe /
translated: When one does not form any volitions, thinking, ‘All phenomena are devoid of volitions,’

original: sems gnas pa smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste /
analyzed: sems gnas pa smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste /
translated: the gateway to liberation that is aspirationlessness is the abiding of the mind.

original: 'di ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the meditative absorption of aspirationlessness.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag la zhum pa med par dran par bya ste /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag la zhum pa med par dran par bya ste /
translated: One should be mindful of these three gateways to liberation without being discouraged.

original: rab 'byor / 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Subhūti, this too is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings, in that it is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is as follows:

original: 'di ltar shes pa bcu gcig ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar shes pa bcu gcig ste /
translated: There are eleven types of knowledge.

original: bcu gcig gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gcig gang zhe na /
translated: What are the eleven?

original: sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /
analyzed: sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /
translated: the knowledge of suffering, the knowledge of the origin of suffering, the knowledge of the cessation of suffering, the knowledge of the path, the knowledge of destruction, the knowledge of non-arising, the knowledge of the teaching, the knowledge of the subsequent,

original: kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o //
translated: the conventional knowledge, the knowledge of the path, and the knowledge conforming to the letter.

original: de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the knowledge of suffering?

original: sdug bsngal mi skye bar shes pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal mi skye bar shes pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge that suffering will not arise again.

original: de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the knowledge of the origin of suffering?

original: kun 'byung ba spang bar shes pa'o //
analyzed: kun 'byung ba spang bar shes pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge that the origin of suffering is abandoned.

original: de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na /🔽sdug bsngal 'gog @337a *//
analyzed: de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na / sdug bsngal 'gog @337a *//
translated: What is the knowledge of the cessation of suffering?

original: par shes pa'o //
analyzed: par shes pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge that suffering has ceased.

original: de la lam shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lam shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the knowledge of the path?

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge of the Noble Eightfold Path.

original: de la zad pa shes ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la zad pa shes ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the knowledge of destruction?

original: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zad par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zad par shes pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge that craving is destroyed.

original: de la mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the knowledge of non-arising?

original: srid pa'i rgyud skye ba med par shes pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i rgyud skye ba med par shes pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge that the continuity of existence does not arise.

original: de la chos shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the knowledge of phenomena?

original: phung po lnga sgyu mar yongs su rtogs shing shes pa'o //
analyzed: phung po lnga sgyu mar yongs su rtogs shing shes pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge that the five aggregates are like an illusion.

original: de la rjes su rtogs pa shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rjes su rtogs pa shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the knowledge of subsequent understanding?

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge that the sense spheres, the elements, and dependent origination are impermanent.🔽“What is conventional knowledge?

original: de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na; sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi sems sems kyis shes pa'o //
analyzed: de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na; sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi sems sems kyis shes pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge of the minds of other beings and other individuals.

original: de la 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the knowledge of what is familiar?

original: gang gis lam shes pa dang / yongs su byang ba shes pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis lam shes pa dang / yongs su byang ba shes pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge of the path and the knowledge of purification.

original: de la sgra ji bzhin shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sgra ji bzhin shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the knowledge of the way things are?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
translated: It is the knowledge of the Tathāgata’s gnosis of omniscience.

original: rab 'byor / 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: This, Subhūti, is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings, by way of not apprehending anything.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings

original: 'di ltar dbang po gsum ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar dbang po gsum ste /
translated: is like this: the three faculties.

original: gsum gang zhe na /
analyzed: gsum gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three?

original: yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: The faculty of ‘I will completely know the unknown,’ the faculty of complete knowledge, and the faculty of the conviction of complete knowledge.

original: de la yongs @337b su ma shes par yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yongs @337b su ma shes par yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the faculty of ‘I will completely know the unknown’?

original: slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang; dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po yongs su snang bar ma gyur pa 'di ni /
analyzed: slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang; dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po yongs su snang bar ma gyur pa 'di ni /
translated: The faculty of faith, the faculty of diligence, the faculty of mindfulness, the faculty of concentration, and the faculty of wisdom of those who are still training and have not yet attained manifest realization.

original: yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po'o; ;de la yongs su shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na /
analyzed: yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po'o; ;de la yongs su shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the faculty of complete understanding?”

original: gang zag slob pa yongs su shes par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste /
analyzed: gang zag slob pa yongs su shes par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste /
translated: The faculty of faith, the faculty of diligence, the faculty of mindfulness, the faculty of concentration, and the faculty of wisdom of those who are still training and have attained complete understanding.

original: 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the faculty of complete understanding.

original: de la yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the faculty of realizing complete understanding?”

original: gang zag mi slob pa dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /
analyzed: gang zag mi slob pa dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /
translated: The faculty of faith, the faculty of diligence, the faculty of mindfulness, the faculty of concentration, and the faculty of wisdom of individuals who are nonlearners—that is, arhats, pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattvas, and tathagatas.

original: shes rab kyi dbang po ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi dbang po ste /
translated: the faculty of faith, the faculty of perseverance, the faculty of mindfulness, the faculty of stable attention, and the faculty of wisdom of the person who is a nonlearner, an arhat, a pratyekabuddha, a bodhisattva, and a tathāgata.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste /
translated: Subhūti, this is called the faculty of understanding through comprehension.

original: rab 'byor / 'di 'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di 'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Subhūti, this too is the Great Vehicle of bodhisattva great beings, in that it is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of bodhisattva great beings is as follows:

original: 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum ste /
translated: there are three meditative absorptions.

original: @338a *// gsum gang zhe na /
analyzed: @338a *// gsum gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three?

original: rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te //
translated: the concentration that is accompanied by investigation and sustained thought, the concentration that is free of investigation but accompanied by sustained thought, and the concentration that is free of both investigation and sustained thought.

original: de la rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the concentration that is accompanied by investigation and sustained thought?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben /
translated: Subhūti, here the bodhisattva-mahāsattva, separated from desire,

original: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa /
analyzed: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa /
translated: separated from evil and unwholesome dharmas,

original: rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
translated: with investigation and sustained thought,

original: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can /🔽bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas pa 'di ni /
analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can / bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas pa 'di ni /
translated: with joy and happiness born of separation,🔽establishes and dwells in the first concentration.

original: rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the concentration that is accompanied by investigation and sustained thought.

original: de la rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the concentration that is free of investigation but accompanied by sustained thought?

original: bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar te /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar te /
translated: between the first concentration and the second concentration.

original: 'di ni rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the concentration without applied thought but with sustained thought.

original: de la rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the concentration without applied thought and without sustained thought?”

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang; 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang / 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang; 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang / 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
translated: It is the second concentration, the third concentration, the fourth concentration, the sphere of infinite space, the sphere of infinite consciousness, the sphere of nothingness, the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception, and the cessation of perception and feeling.

original: 'di ni mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the concentration without applied thought and without sustained thought.

original: rab 'byor / @338b 'di'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / @338b 'di'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Subhūti, this too is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings, by way of not apprehending anything.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar rjes su dran pa bcu ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar rjes su dran pa bcu ste /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is as follows: the ten recollections.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong pa rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong pa rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /
translated: the recollection of the Buddha, the recollection of the Dharma, the recollection of the Saṅgha, the recollection of morality, the recollection of giving, the recollection of the gods, the recollection of inhalation and exhalation,

original: skye ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa ste /
analyzed: skye ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa ste /
translated: the recollection of death, the recollection of the body, and the recollection of the noble ones.

original: rab 'byor / 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Subhūti, this too is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings, in that it is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni; 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni; 'di lta ste /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is as follows:

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste /
translated: the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight liberations, and the nine serial absorptions.

original: de la bsam gtan bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bsam gtan bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: “What are the four concentrations?

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Here, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: 'dod pas dben /
analyzed: 'dod pas dben /
translated: they are free from desire,

original: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa /
analyzed: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa /
translated: free from evil and unwholesome dharmas,

original: rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
translated: with thought and reflection,

original: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: and they accomplish and dwell in the first concentration that has joy and happiness born of seclusion.🔽When discursive thought and discursive evaluation have been stilled,

original: de @339a *// rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /🔽sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas /
analyzed: de @339a *// rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste / sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas /
translated: and they have inner clarity and🔽a one-pointed mind,

original: rtog pa med pa /
analyzed: rtog pa med pa /
translated: they are without thought and

original: dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can /
analyzed: dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can /
translated: He abides in the second concentration, which is free of investigation and analysis, and is filled with the joy and bliss born of meditative stabilization.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing /
translated: He abides in the second concentration, which is free of investigation and analysis, and is filled with the joy and bliss born of meditative stabilization.🔽He is free of attachment to joy, and so he abides in mindfulness and clear knowledge,

original: shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te /
analyzed: shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te /
translated: and he abides in equanimity.

original: bde ba lus kyis myong la /🔽'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bde ba lus kyis myong la / 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He experiences bliss with his body,

original: bde ba la rnam par spyod pa /
analyzed: bde ba la rnam par spyod pa /
translated: and the noble ones declare of him that he abides in mindfulness and bliss,

original: btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /
analyzed: btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /
translated: and that he is equanimous.

original: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He abides in the third concentration, which is without joy.

original: de bde ba'ang spangs sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing /
analyzed: de bde ba'ang spangs sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing /
translated: He gives up both pleasure and pain,

original: yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas /🔽bde ba'ang med sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa /
analyzed: yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas /🔽bde ba'ang med sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa /
translated: and so with the disappearance of mental pleasure and displeasure,🔽he abides in the fourth concentration, which is without pleasure or pain and is purified in terms of equanimity and mindfulness.

original: btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te /
analyzed: btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te /
translated: He attains and abides in the fourth concentration, which is purified of distraction and disquiet, and is accompanied by equanimity and mindfulness, and is neither suffering nor happiness, on account of the purity of equanimity and mindfulness.

original: de dag ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'o //
translated: These are the four concentrations.

original: de la tshad med pa bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la tshad med pa bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: “What are the four immeasurables?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa /
analyzed: byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa /
translated: they fill the ten directions, as far as the realm of phenomena extends, as far as space extends, with a mind of loving kindness that is vast, exceedingly vast,

original: mi gnyis pa /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa /
translated: nondual,

original: tshad med pa /🔽gcugs med pa /🔽gnod pa med pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa / gcugs med pa / gnod pa med pa /
translated: immeasurable,🔽unadulterated,🔽harmless,

original: ltod pa med pa /🔽yongs su rdzogs pa /
analyzed: ltod pa med pa / yongs su rdzogs pa /
translated: unrivaled,🔽perfectly complete,🔽and well cultivated.

original: shin tu bsgoms pas /🔽'jig @339b rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: shin tu bsgoms pas / 'jig @339b rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: They resolve it and🔽practice it on account of the nonapprehension of all phenomena.

original: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing /
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing /
translated: They fill the ten directions, as far as the realm of phenomena extends, as far as space extends, with a mind of compassion, a mind of sympathetic joy, and a mind of equanimity that are vast, exceedingly vast,🔽nondual,🔽immeasurable,🔽unadulterated,🔽harmless,

original: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod do //
translated: unrivaled,🔽perfectly complete,🔽and well cultivated.🔽They resolve it and🔽practice it on account of the nonapprehension of all phenomena.

original: snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa /
analyzed: snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa /
translated: vast, expansive,

original: mi gnyis pa /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa /
translated: nondual,

original: tshad med pa /🔽gcugs med pa /🔽gnod pa med pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa / gcugs med pa / gnod pa med pa /
translated: immeasurable,🔽unadulterated,🔽harmless,

original: ltod pa med pa /
analyzed: ltod pa med pa /
translated: unobstructed,

original: yongs su rdzogs pa /
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa /
translated: and completely perfected,

original: shin tu bsgoms pas /🔽'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: shin tu bsgoms pas / 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: and having meditated on them well,

original: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste /
translated: he fills the ten directions, as vast as the dharmadhātu and the limits of space,

original: mos par byas shing /
analyzed: mos par byas shing /
translated: with them,

original: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod de /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod de /
translated: and experiences them through the method of nonobservation.

original: de dag ni tshad med pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: de dag ni tshad med pa bzhi'o //
translated: Those are the four immeasurables.

original: de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: “What are the four formless absorptions?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: they completely transcend all perceptions of form,

original: thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /
analyzed: thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /
translated: The perception of obstruction disappears,

original: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas /
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas /
translated: and since one does not pay attention to the perception of variety,

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te /
translated: one thinks, “Space is infinite,”

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: and thus one achieves and abides in the sphere of infinite space.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: “In every way, one transcends the sphere of infinite space,

original: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so //
translated: and thinks, ‘Consciousness is infinite.’

original: zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas @340a *//
analyzed: zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas @340a *//
translated: Thus one achieves and abides in the sphere of infinite consciousness.

original: so; ;de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: so; ;de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: “In every way, one transcends the sphere of infinite consciousness,

original: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: and thinks, ‘There is nothing at all.’ Thus one achieves and abides in the sphere of nothing whatsoever.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: “In every way, one transcends the sphere of nothing whatsoever,

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: and achieves and abides in the sphere of neither perception nor nonperception.

original: de dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: de dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o //
translated: These are the four formless absorptions.

original: de la rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na /
translated: What are the eight liberations?

original: gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o //🔽nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas /🔽phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni /
analyzed: gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o // nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas / phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni /
translated: The first liberation is for one who has form to see forms.

original: rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o //
translated: The second liberation is for one who has no internal conception of form to see external forms.

original: bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o //
analyzed: bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o //
translated: The third liberation is for one who has no internal conception of form to see external forms.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te /🔽thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te / thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /
translated: The fourth liberation is for one who has no internal conception of form to see external forms.

original: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas /🔽nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te /🔽nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas / nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: The fifth liberation is for one who has no internal conception of form to see external forms.🔽The sixth liberation is for one who has no internal conception of form to see external forms.🔽The seventh liberation is for one who has no internal conception of form to see external forms.🔽The eighth liberation is for one who has no internal conception of form to see external forms.🔽The ninth liberation is for one who has no internal conception of form to see external forms.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: The tenth liberation is for one who has no internal conception of form to see external forms.

original: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so //
translated: “Consciousness is infinite,”

original: zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //

original: de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las @340b yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las @340b yang dag par 'das te /

original: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: he actualizes and abides in the sphere of nothingness.🔽“In all ways, the sphere of nothingness is infinite,”

original: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te; 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te; 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //

original: de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /

original: 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //

original: de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do //
analyzed: de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do //
translated: These are the eight liberations.

original: de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the nine serial absorptions?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, here, when bodhisattva-mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: 'dod pas dben /
analyzed: 'dod pas dben /
translated: they are free from desire,

original: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa /
analyzed: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa /
translated: free from evil and nonvirtuous phenomena,

original: rtog pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas pa /

original: dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: and abide in the first concentration that is born of seclusion and has joy and happiness.

original: de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas /
analyzed: de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas /

original: nang yongs su dang ste /
analyzed: nang yongs su dang ste /
translated: they are inwardly clear,

original: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas /🔽rtog pa med pa /
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas / rtog pa med pa /
translated: and with a one-pointed mind-stream,🔽without applied and sustained thought,

original: dpyod pa med pa /
analyzed: dpyod pa med pa /
translated: without conceptualization and analysis,

original: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can /

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: they abide in the second concentration.

original: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas /
analyzed: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas /

original: dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te /

original: bde ba lus kyis myong la /
analyzed: bde ba lus kyis myong la /

analyzed: 'phags @341a *// pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa /
translated: The noble ones describe him as ‘a person who is mindful and

original: bde ba la rnam par spyod pa /
analyzed: bde ba la rnam par spyod pa /
translated: experiences happiness with his body.

original: btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /
analyzed: btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /

analyzed: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He has attained the third meditative concentration, which is without🔽joy.

original: de bde ba'ang spangs /
analyzed: de bde ba'ang spangs /

original: sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas /

original: bde ba'ang med /
analyzed: bde ba'ang med /

analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //

original: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas /

analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: “Space is infinite,”🔽and he achieves and remains in the sphere of infinite space.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: Having completely transcended the sphere of infinite space,

original: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so //
translated: he thinks, “Consciousness is infinite,”

original: zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: and he achieves and remains in the sphere of infinite consciousness.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: Having completely transcended the sphere of infinite consciousness,🔽he thinks, “There is nothing at all,”

original: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: and he achieves and remains in the sphere of nothing-at-all.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: Having completely transcended the sphere of nothing-at-all,

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te @341b gnas so //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te @341b gnas so //
translated: he achieves and remains in the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: Having completely transcended the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception,

original: 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te /
analyzed: 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te /
translated: and he abides in the attainment of the cessation of perception and feeling, but without taking that attainment as a support.

original: de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o //
analyzed: de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o //
translated: These are the nine serial absorptions.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being’s Great Vehicle is as follows: the ten tathāgata powers.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽gnas la'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / gnas la'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom🔽know a basis to be a basis as it actually is,

original: gnas ma yin pa la'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gnas ma yin pa la'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: and they know a nonbasis to be a nonbasis as it actually is.

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / las yongs su len pa'i rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / las yongs su len pa'i rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the various and many elements of other beings and individuals as they truly are.🔽He knows the various and many paths of beings as they truly are.🔽He knows the various and many concentrations, liberations, samādhis, and samāpattis of beings as they truly are.🔽He knows the defilement and purification of the various and many afflictions of beings as they truly are.🔽He knows the various and many ways of recollecting former states.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams ni sna tshogs can te /🔽'jig rten gyi khams ni du ma pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams ni sna tshogs can te / 'jig rten gyi khams ni du ma pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //

original: sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
