analyzed: sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so // kun tu @342a *//
translated: He knows the various and many ways of being in meditative equipoise and rising from meditative equipoise.🔽He knows the various and many ways of being in meditative equipoise and not rising from meditative equipoise.🔽He knows the various and many ways of rising from meditative equipoise and not being in meditative equipoise.

original: 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the various and many ways of being in meditative equipoise and rising from meditative equipoise.🔽He knows the various and many ways of being in meditative equipoise and not rising from meditative equipoise.🔽He knows the various and many ways of rising from meditative equipoise and not being in meditative equipoise.🔽He knows the various and

original: dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is the arrangement of the faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, meditative stabilizations, liberations, samādhis, and absorptions, and the afflicted and purified phenomena.

original: de rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te /
analyzed: de rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te /
translated: He recollects his manifold previous abodes,

original: tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas /
analyzed: tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas /
translated: recollecting one lifetime,🔽recollecting two, three, four, five, ten, twenty, thirty, forty,🔽fifty,🔽hundred,

original: rnam pa dang bcas /🔽sa mal dang bcas /🔽gtan tshigs dang bcas pa'i bar du /
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas / sa mal dang bcas / gtan tshigs dang bcas pa'i bar du /
translated: thousand,🔽hundred thousand lifetimes,

original: rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no //
analyzed: rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no //
translated: recollecting the manifold previous abodes with their aspects, their particulars, and their causes.

original: de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: With his purified divine eye he knows as it really is the passing away and rebirth of beings.

original: zag pa zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba /
analyzed: zag pa zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba /
translated: His mind is liberated from contaminations without remainder, and his wisdom is liberated.

original: zag pa med pa /
analyzed: zag pa med pa /
translated: uncontaminated,

original: rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon par bya ste /
analyzed: rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon par bya ste /
translated: and manifest through his own superknowledge.

original: nye bar bsgrubs shing rnam par spyod do //
analyzed: nye bar bsgrubs shing rnam par spyod do //
translated: He accomplishes and practices them.

original: bdag gi skye ba ni zad do //🔽bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do //
analyzed: bdag gi skye ba ni zad do // bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do //
translated: “My births have been exhausted.🔽I have practiced pure conduct.

original: bya ba ni byas so //
analyzed: bya ba ni byas so //
translated: I have done what needed to be done.

original: rnam pa 'di lta bu gzhan ni med do zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di lta bu gzhan ni med do zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
translated: I will not experience another existence.”

original: rab 'byor / 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Subhūti, this too is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings, in that it is a nonapprehending mode.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi ste /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is as follows: It is the four forms of fearlessness.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: bdag gis @342b yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na /
analyzed: bdag gis @342b yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na /
translated: “I have declared, ‘I am perfectly and completely awakened.’🔽If anyone were to say of me, ‘These phenomena have not been fully awakened to,’

original: de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la /
analyzed: de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la /
translated: then,

original: dge sbyong ngam /
analyzed: dge sbyong ngam /
translated: whether a monk,🔽a brahmin,

original: bram ze'am / lha'am /
analyzed: bram ze'am / lha'am /
translated: a god,🔽a demon,🔽or anyone else,

original: bdud dam / tshangs pa'am; gzhan su'ang rung ste /
analyzed: bdud dam / tshangs pa'am; gzhan su'ang rung ste /
translated: Mara, Brahma, or anyone else,🔽

original: 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: “I do not see any reason why any god, demon, Brahmā, or anyone else in the world could legitimately dispute this.

original: rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since I do not see any reason,

original: de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de /
analyzed: de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de /
translated: I have attained happiness, attained fearlessness, and attained independence.

original: khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o //
analyzed: khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o //
translated: I will live in the abode of a great bull,

original: 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go /🔽tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na /
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go / tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na /
translated: roar the lion’s roar in the assembly,

original: dge sbyong ngam /🔽bram ze'am / lha'am /🔽bdud dam / tshangs pa'am /🔽gzhan sus kyang rung ste /
analyzed: dge sbyong ngam / bram ze'am / lha'am / bdud dam / tshangs pa'am / gzhan sus kyang rung ste /
translated: and turn the wheel that has not been turned in the world by any renunciant, brahmin, god, Māra, Brahmā, or anyone else.

original: chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa /
analyzed: chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa /

original: bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o //
translated: I will turn it.

original: bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na /
analyzed: bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na /

original: de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar /
analyzed: de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar /
translated: then these defilements have not come to an end.

original: bdag la dge sbyong ngam /🔽bram ze'am / lha'am /🔽bdud dam; tshangs pa'am /🔽gzhan su'ang rung ste /
analyzed: bdag la dge sbyong ngam / bram ze'am / lha'am / bdud dam; tshangs pa'am / gzhan su'ang rung ste /
translated: I do not see any reason why any ascetic, brahmin, god, Māra, Brahmā, or anyone else in the world could legitimately challenge me, saying:

original: 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /🔽rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste / rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /

original: de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod do //
analyzed: de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod do //
translated: Since I do not see any reason for that, I have attained security, attained fearlessness, and attained the ability to roar the lion’s roar in the assemblies.

original: khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o //
analyzed: khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o //
translated: I will live in the abode of the great bull,

original: 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra @343a *//🔽bsgrag go / tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam /🔽bram ze'am / lha'am /🔽bdud dam / tshangs pa'am /
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra @343a *// bsgrag go / tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam / bram ze'am / lha'am / bdud dam / tshangs pa'am /
translated: I will proclaim the lion’s roar in the midst of the assembly,

original: gzhan sus kyang rung ste /
analyzed: gzhan sus kyang rung ste /
translated: and I will turn the wheel that has never been turned by any ascetic, brahmin, god, Māra, Brahmā, or anyone else in the world,

original: chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa /🔽bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa /🔽bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o //
translated: the wheel that is endowed with the Dharma,🔽and that cannot be turned back by anyone in the world.

analyzed: bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med de /

original: de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam /
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam /
translated: Therefore, I do not see any reason why a monk,

original: bram ze'am / lha'am /
analyzed: bram ze'am / lha'am /
translated: a brahmin, a god,

original: bdud dam / tshangs pa'am /🔽gzhan su'ang rung ste /
analyzed: bdud dam / tshangs pa'am / gzhan su'ang rung ste /
translated: a Māra, a Brahmā,

analyzed: 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: or anyone else in the world could legitimately dispute this.

original: rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
analyzed: rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
translated: Since I do not see any reason,

original: de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de /🔽khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o //
analyzed: de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de / khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o //
translated: I have attained happiness, attained fearlessness, and attained the ability to teach.

original: 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go /
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go /
translated: I will proclaim the lion’s roar in the midst of the assembly.

original: tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam /
translated: I will turn the wheel of Brahmā in the world.

original: bram ze'am / lha'am /
analyzed: bram ze'am / lha'am /
translated: A monk, a brahmin, a god,

original: bdud dam / tshangs pa'am /
analyzed: bdud dam / tshangs pa'am /
translated: a Māra, a Brahmā,🔽or anyone else in the world could legitimately dispute this.

original: gzhan sus kyang rung ste /
analyzed: gzhan sus kyang rung ste /
translated: No one else,🔽whether a monk, a brahman, a god, a Māra, a Brahmā, or anyone else in the world,

original: chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa /
analyzed: chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa /

original: bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o //

analyzed: gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba /
translated: If I were to teach the path that leads to the realization of the noble ones,

analyzed: de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'byung @343b ngo zhes bya ba de lta bu'i gnas med de /

analyzed: de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam / bram ze'am / lha'am /
translated: Therefore, I do not see any reason to think that

analyzed: bdud dam / tshangs pa'am / gzhan su'ang rung ste /
translated: a monk, a brahman, a god, a Māra, a Brahmā,🔽or anyone else in the world🔽could legitimately challenge me, saying,

analyzed: 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

analyzed: rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /

original: de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de /
analyzed: de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de /
translated: He practices having attained happiness, having attained fearlessness, having attained confidence.🔽He makes his proclamation in the midst of the assembly:

original: khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o //
analyzed: khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o //
translated: “I am the bull, the great bull, the bull supreme!

analyzed: 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go / tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam /
translated: I will roar the lion’s roar!

original: bram ze'am / lha'am /
analyzed: bram ze'am / lha'am /
translated: I will turn the wheel that has not been turned in accordance with the Dharma by any mendicant, brahmin, god,🔽demon,

original: bdud dam / tshangs pa'am /
analyzed: bdud dam / tshangs pa'am /
translated: Brahmā,

original: gzhan sus kyang rung ste /
analyzed: gzhan sus kyang rung ste /
translated: or anyone else in the world!

original: chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: I will turn the wheel of Dharma in a way that cannot be turned by those who are not endowed with Dharma.”🔽

original: rab 'byor / 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Subhūti, this too is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings, in that it is a nonapprehending process.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is as follows:

original: 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste /
translated: It is the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sbobs  pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste /
analyzed: don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sbobs  pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste /
translated: the discernment of meaning, the discernment of the teachings, the discernment of expression, and the discernment of confidence.

original: rab 'byor / 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Subhūti, this also is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings, in that it does not apprehend anything.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang @344a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang @344a *//
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings

original: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de /
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de /
translated: is the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: bco brgyad gang zhe na /
analyzed: bco brgyad gang zhe na /
translated: What are the eighteen?

original: gang gi nam la de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nam la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa; tshangs pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: gang gi nam la de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nam la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa; tshangs pa dang bcas pa /
translated: The time when the Tathāgata fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, the time when the world with its gods, humans, and asuras,

original: dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa /
analyzed: dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa /
translated: the entire world of beings, including ascetics and priests, gods, humans, and asuras,

original: sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis rjes su bstan te /
analyzed: sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis rjes su bstan te /
translated: and taught them the path that leads to the cessation of suffering.

original: phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i bar du /
analyzed: phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i bar du /
translated: Until they attained final nirvāṇa in the realm of nirvāṇa without the aggregates remaining,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o //🔽ca co mi mnga'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o // ca co mi mnga'o //
translated: the Tathāgata was never without mindfulness.🔽He was never without alertness.

original: dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o //
translated: He never had a lapse in his intention.

original: 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o //🔽thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga'o //
analyzed: 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o // thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga'o //
translated: He never had a variety of thoughts.🔽He never had an uncollected mind.

original: ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o //🔽mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
analyzed: ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o // mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
translated: He never had an indifference that was not derived from discernment.🔽He never had a lapse in his interest.

original: brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //🔽dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o // dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
translated: He never had a lapse in his diligence.🔽He never had a lapse in his intention.

original: ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
translated: He never had a lapse in his meditative absorption.

original: shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
analyzed: shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
translated: He never had a lapse in his wisdom.

original: rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
translated: He does not lose his liberation.

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o //
translated: He does not lose the vision of wisdom that is liberated.

original: sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste /
translated: All his physical actions are preceded by wisdom.

original: ye @344b shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //
analyzed: ye @344b shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //
translated: They follow wisdom.

original: gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste /
translated: All his verbal actions are preceded by wisdom.

original: ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //
analyzed: ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //
translated: They follow wisdom.

original: thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste /
translated: All his mental actions are preceded by wisdom.

original: ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //🔽'das pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /🔽ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /
analyzed: ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /
translated: They follow wisdom.🔽His vision of wisdom is unobstructed and unattached in the past.🔽His vision of wisdom is unobstructed and unattached in the future.

original: da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa ste /
translated: His vision of wisdom is unobstructed and unattached in the present.

original: rab 'byor / 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: This, Subhuti, is the great vehicle of the Bodhisattva, the great being.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: Furthermore, Subhuti, the great vehicle of the Bodhisattva, the great being, is as follows:

original: 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams te /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams te /
translated: the dhāraṇī doors.

original: de'ang yi ge mnyam pa nyid dang / brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ge la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: de'ang yi ge mnyam pa nyid dang / brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ge la 'jug pa ste /
translated: They are the sameness of letters, the sameness of expressions, the door of letters, and the entrance into letters.

original: de la yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ge la 'jug pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ge la 'jug pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the door of letters and the entrance into letters?

original: aa zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
analyzed: aa zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
translated: A is the door of all dharmas because of non-arising.

original: ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
analyzed: ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
translated: Ra is the door of all dharmas because of being free from dust.

original: pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa stong pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
analyzed: pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa stong pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
translated: Pa is the door of all dharmas because of ultimate emptiness.

original: tsa zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tsa zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir /
translated: Ca is the door of all dharmas because of not observing death and rebirth.

original: chos thams cad 'chi 'pho dang skye ba med pas; chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad 'chi 'pho dang skye ba med pas; chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
translated: Since all phenomena are free from death and rebirth, they are the gateway to all phenomena.

original: na zhes bya ba ni ming dang bral zhing /
analyzed: na zhes bya ba ni ming dang bral zhing /
translated: “ Na” is free from names

original: ming gi rang bzhin ma thob ma stor bas /
analyzed: ming gi rang bzhin ma thob ma stor bas /
translated: and is neither obtained nor lost in terms of the nature of names.

original: chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the gateway to all phenomena.

original: l'a zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing /🔽srid pa'i @345a *//
analyzed: l'a zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing / srid pa'i @345a *//
translated: “ Lā” is beyond the world🔽and is the gateway to all phenomena because it has destroyed the vines of existence,

original: 'khri shing dang / rgyu dang / rkyen yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
analyzed: 'khri shing dang / rgyu dang / rkyen yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
translated: causes, and conditions.

original: d'a zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang dul ba'i gnas su yongs su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
analyzed: d'a zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang dul ba'i gnas su yongs su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
translated: “ Dā” is the gateway to all phenomena because it is ascertained as the basis of taming and being tamed.

original: b'a zhes bya ba ni bcings pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
analyzed: b'a zhes bya ba ni bcings pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
translated: “ Bā” is the gateway to all phenomena because it is free from bondage.

original: da zhes bya ba ni dkrugs ma dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //🔽sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa mi dmigs pas chags par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: da zhes bya ba ni dkrugs ma dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //🔽sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa mi dmigs pas chags par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: “ Dā” is the gateway to all phenomena because it is free from agitation.🔽“ Sa” is the gateway to all phenomena because attachment is not observed and therefore does not arise.

original: 'ching bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //🔽ba zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam dang sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'ching bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o // ba zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam dang sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir /
translated: It is the gateway to all phenomena because it is not bound.

original: chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
translated: The syllable ba is the gateway to all phenomena because it is the cessation of the path of speech and sound.
